title: Dubai
description: Experience luxury, shopping, desert safaris, and iconic landmarks in the heart of the Middle East. Dubai offers a perfect blend of modern innovation and traditional charm.
climate: Dubai has a hot desert climate with very hot summers (June-September) reaching 45°C and mild winters (November-March) with temperatures around 25°C. The best time to visit is during winter months when the weather is pleasant for outdoor activities.

seo.title: Dubai Travel Guide 2024 | Luxury Destinations & Desert Adventures
seo.description: Complete Dubai travel guide covering luxury hotels, desert safaris, shopping, and iconic landmarks. Plan your Dubai trip with Idea Holiday.
